text:
Created attachment 29625
Clear on import Patch

Hi,


Here is my patch proposal : 
CONTEXT : 
As explained in the documentation, I use "Simple Data Writer" in my batch . In order to follow the state of the script, I import the JTL file in an other Jmeter to some specific Listener (JmeterPlugins for example). 
ISSUE : 
When you load a file, the previous elements are not discarded and the new results in the file are added to the previous one
PROPOSAL : 
Add a checkbox which will allow to choose to Clear value when load the file 

You will find attached my proposed patch

Best Regards,
creator: etienne.carriere@gmail.com

text:
Thanks for the suggestion, but it's already very easy to clear a Listener: 

Select the Listener, and click Run/Clear - or press Shift+Ctrl+E
creator: sebb@apache.org
